billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Creates a social host law prohibiting the permitting of the consumption of alcoholic beverages by persons under the age of twenty-one years
summary: provides that no person who is over the age of twenty-one years who owns, rents or controls a private residence shall permit the consumption of alcoholic beverages by any person, actually or apparently, under the age of twenty-one years who is present at any party, gathering or event on the premises of such person; defines "party, gathering or event" and "permit".
actClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to permitting the consumption of alcoholic beverages by minors
